name: Carcapp - Carcassonne Scoreboard
description:
Love to play Carcassonne? We know the feeling!

But, also tired of counting the points yourself? Or forget to turn those 50 point cards from time to time? We're here to help!
Carcapp is an app that does the scoring for you. Simply add the players and tell the app which player gets points. We'll do the counting for you and show a ranking of all players.

Enjoy Carcassonne, don't cheat ;-) And good luck!


* This is not a full game of Carcassonne. You need a real Carcassonne board game to use this app.
